name: Sonic.EXE Remastered by Sonic's Gaming Hub
name_original: Sonic.EXE Remastered by Sonic's Gaming Hub
description:
A recreation of the Sonic.EXE creepypasta, this remake brings the exact content as the original but in widescreen, improvements, the original Sonic.EXE voice, all secret zones, and if you thought that wasn't enough, this remake has 2 parts, the first half is the original Sonic.EXE and the second part is a remaster of ROUND2.EXE. And the game even says your name like in the original.

This remake was made with my engine Genesis Sonic Worlds.

This project was such a great time for many YouTubers to play and I'm happy many of you guys like it, but your gonna like how it is now, enjoy the Tails demo we have for you right now!

The version downloadable you see below is only a Tails demo we have for you guys as a preview of how I'm making the game look.
